tool_description: Get the latest news on Augmented Reality and Virtual Reality.
name: AR VR News
title: AR VR News

api_list.name: getNews
api_list.description: Get all news about AR and VR
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ar-vr-news2.p.rapidapi.com/api/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ar-vr-news2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ar-vr-news2.p.rapidapi.com/api/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ar-vr-news2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
